title: Survey Abandoned
description: Fires when a user abandons a survey before completing it.

surveyId.description: The unique identifier of the survey.

lastQuestionIndex.description: The index of the last question viewed before abandoning.

questionsAnswered.description: The number of questions answered before abandoning.

totalQuestions.description: The total number of questions in the survey.

duration.description: Time spent before abandoning in seconds.
